title: Create Listings That Sell
description: A systematic approach to photos, titles, pricing, and crosslisting that gets items sold faster.

steps.title: Take photos that convert
steps.description: Clean background, natural lighting, 6+ angles. The hero shot determines if buyers click.

steps.title: Write a keyword-rich title
steps.description: Include brand, model, size, color, and condition. Buyers search for specifics.

steps.title: Research competitive pricing
steps.description: Use Product Search to see what similar items actually sold for (not just listed).

steps.title: Crosslist to all relevant platforms
steps.description: One item on 3 platforms gets 3x the visibility. Takes 2 minutes with Orben.

steps.title: Send offers to watchers
steps.description: Use Pro Tools â†’ Send Offers to reach eBay buyers who saved your listing.

steps.title: Reprice items older than 30 days
steps.description: If something hasn't sold in 30 days, drop 10% and try a different platform.
